Player History
Drafted in 21st round, 333rd overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/2/2015...
Injured on 9/4/2015 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,028,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/4/2016 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/2/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $3,300,000 per year...
